Package util

Class SQL<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.SQL<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Defines the current Type
    public class SQL<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to make SQL Queries easily for any type of objects or any number of references
